entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Mississauga
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:24 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 01:17 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -14.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -18.4°C
Wind: SW 37 km/h gust 64 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 13. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
